english.segment1: I cannot see. This cloud will not break. It created suffering. It's what I did
english.segment2: Take me up. It's my desire. Speak to me. Sun bleeds through cloud cover
english.segment3: If darkness comes to me. What should I do?. Is there a chance for me. If I have Your love?
english.segment4: Take me up. It's my desire. Speak to me. Sun bleeds through cloud cover
english.segment5: Just speak to me. I need Your desire. I don't want just to feel it. To know that You know who I am
english.segment6: Take me up. It's my desire. Speak to me. Sun bleeds through cloud cover. Cloud Cover!
english.segment7: Take me up. It's my desire. Speak to me. Sun bleeds through cloud cover
english.segment8: You're all.. You're all.. You're all.. You're all I see
english.segment9: You're all.. You're all.. You're all I see. You're all.. You're all.. You're all I see. You're all.. You're all.. You're all I see. You're all.. You're all.. You're all I see. You're all.. You're all.. You're all I see
english.segment10: You're all I see. You're all I see. You're all I see!
